sentences: I 'm really not an apple fan , but the Apple system is not stuck , this is a fact . The Huawei I bought by my family was really good at first , but became slower and slower , and often downloaded the software by itself . However , the Apple 6s bought at the same time can still be used now . Although it is still slower than the new mobile phone , it is much better than the Android system .
